name: Hanako: Honor & Blade
description: Free Weekend + Next Patch: Early Access v.3 - April 4th, 2019 Travel through a beautiful, fictional rendition of the 16th century of Feudal Japan. Choose between four types of warriors as you learn to master intuitive, directionally-driven swordplay while also choosing unique abilities to ensure victory over your foes.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista Processor: Intel Celeron Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 630 GT Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i5 or higher Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 750 or higher Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space
